remarks: Lemma for ~ dvcnvre .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Feb-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2015.)
statement:
dvcnvre.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( X -cn-> RR ) ) $.
dvcnvre.d $e |- ( ph -> dom ( RR _D F ) = X ) $.

dvcnvre.n $e |- N = ( J |`t Y ) $.
dvcnvrelem2 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( F ` C ) e. ( ( int ` T ) ` Y ) /\ `' F e. ( ( N CnP M ) ` ( F ` C ) ) ) ) $.
